attributes.action: Change the law so that this country can NEVER again be taken to war without a referendum where at least 50% of the population approve such a move.
attributes.additional_details: Our politicians have proven, time and time again, that they are endemically dishonest and repeatedly ignore the best interests of the country and the people giving preference to their own financial interests and party politics.  It is wrong that charlatans like this should have the power and authority to take unilateral action on such important matters without gaining the approval of the people in advance.
